trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的实例和其他类型之间来回转换。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.KeyTimeConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.KeyTimeConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Contextual information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换所需的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object can be converted from a given type to an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可将一个对象从给定类型转换成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this type can be converted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可转换此类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Contextual information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换所需的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines if a given type can be converted to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可将给定类型转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this type can be converted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可转换此类型，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Context information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换所需的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Cultural information that is respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换过程中需要考虑的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: The object being converted to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 要转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 实例的对象。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a given object to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将给定对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" />, based on the supplied <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 基于提供的 <paramref name="value" /> 的一个新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Context information required for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换所需的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Cultural information that is respected during conversion.
trans-unit.target: 转换过程中需要考虑的区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> value to convert from.
trans-unit.target: 要从中进行转换的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> to another type.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeyTime" /> 的实例转换为另一种类型。

trans-unit.source: A new object, based on <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于 <paramref name="value" /> 的新对象。
